attributes.action: Bring Back Capital Punishment fro crimes such as the Baby P Case.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We Demand that Capital punishment should be re introduced for crimes such as the baby P case.  These types of people are pure evil and as tax payers we do not see why our tax payers money should be spent on keeping these people.

Also people who are proved to be paedophiles should be forcefully castrated.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
